#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define s(x) scanf("%d",&x);
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x);
#define p(x) printf("%d",x);
#define pl(x) printf("%lld",x);
#define fr(i,a,n) for(i=a;i<n;i++)
#define ln() printf("\n");
typedef long long ll;
ll mod=1000000007;
ll prime[1000069]={0},sum[1000069];
void sieve()
{
    ll i,j,l;
    sum[0]=0;
    sum[1]=0;
    for(i=2;i<=1000069;i++)
    {
        if(prime[i]==0)
        {
            for(j=2*i;j<=1000069;j+=i)
            {
                prime[j]=1;
            }
            sum[i]=sum[i-1]+1;
        }
        else
            sum[i]=sum[i-1];
    }
}
int main()
{
    sieve();
    int n;
    s(n);
    while(n--)
    {
        ll x,y,ct;
        sl(x);sl(y);
        ct=sum[y]-sum[x-1];
        pl(ct);
        ln();
    }
    return 0;
}
